message: Hi, I'm having trouble with my account login
Hello! I'd be happy to help you with your login issue. Can you tell me what error message you're seeing?
It says 'Invalid credentials' but I'm sure I'm using the right password
I understand that's frustrating. Let me check your account status. Can you confirm the email address associated with your account?
Thank you. I can see your account, and it looks like there might have been a recent password reset that didn't complete properly. Would you like me to send you a password reset link?
Yes please, that would be great!
Perfect! I've just sent a password reset link to john.doe@email.com. Please check your email (including spam folder) and follow the instructions. The link will be valid for 24 hours.
Got it! Let me check my email now.
Found the email and reset my password. Let me try logging in now...
Success! It worked perfectly. Thank you so much for your help!
Wonderful! I'm so glad we got that sorted out for you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's everything. You've been incredibly helpful. Have a great day!
Thank you for your kind words! Feel free to reach out if you need any assistance in the future. Have a wonderful day!
